subtasks.description:
Add task archival/compaction for .openagents tasks.jsonl

Design and ship a repeatable archival/compaction flow so closed/old/outdated tasks move from .openagents/tasks.jsonl into a separate archive file while keeping history accessible. Extend the Effect TaskService/CLI to support archiving and reading archived tasks (e.g., .openagents/tasks-archive.jsonl), include age/status filters, tests, and docs so MechaCoder/external agents can run it without manual editing.
